text: Kenneth John Shellito (18 April 1940 â€“ 31 October 2018) was an English footballer and manager. He worked in a coaching role for the Asian Football Confederation in Kuala Lumpur. He was known as a player for Chelsea and the national team. Shellito died at his home from kidney failure and a lung infection on 31 October 2018 in Inanam, Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, aged 78. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection Category:Footballers from London Category:English football managers Category:People from East Ham
title: Ken Shellito
